data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 33,078 believers in Uttar Dinajpur, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Uttar Dinajpur, West Bengal, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Uttar Dinajpur are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Uttar Dinajpur.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Uttar Dinajpur. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Kurariar people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Kurariar people know you.
Spirit, help every believer in Uttar Dinajpur, West Bengal, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the county of Uttar Dinajpur, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Uttar Dinajpur, West Bengal, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

location.name: Uttar Dinajpur
location.people_groups_list: Musahar (Hindu traditions), Teli Gangauta (Hindu traditions), Rayeen (Muslim traditions), Balija (Muslim traditions), Lohar Kamti
